sect1.title: PSX_Html_Filter
sect1.para: Filter html input based on an whitelist collection of allowed elements

sect1.title: PSX_Html_Filter_Collection_Html5
sect1.para: Collection off all html5 elements from the current specification. See http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/ for more informations. Must be only used with trusted content because it allows all elements from the specification (script, forms, etc.)

sect1.title: PSX_Html_Filter_Collection_Html5Inline
sect1.para: Collection of all html5 elements wich can be used inside of an body tag. Must be only used with trusted content because it allows all elements from the specification (script, forms, etc.)

sect1.title: PSX_Html_Filter_Collection_Html5Text
sect1.para: Collection of the most important html text level semantics tag. Can be used with untrusted content.

sect1.title: PSX_Html_Lexer
PSX_Html_Parse
sect1.para: This class is for parsing html. It is especially designed for parsing invalid html. It uses the html lexer and parses only the header or body part dependening on the value wich you want fetch
